p: To assess numeracy and graph literacy, two numeracy items were taken from [ 19] and two graph literacy items were taken from [ 20, 21]. Only four items were carefully selected based on this previous research due to time constraints for conducting the survey during the COP conference. For illustration of a sample item, one of the numeracy items was: “The chance of getting a viral infection is 0.0005. Out of 10,000 people, about how many of them are expected to get infected?”, see Appendix A ( Figure A2) for all numeracy and graph literacy items.
